statements: DELETE FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND budget > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'website_visit';
DELETE FROM customer_interaction_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_time >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM retargeting_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 500 OR target_audience = 'Tech enthusiasts'
DELETE FROM campaign_interactions WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND interaction_id = 20;
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting' AND interaction_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND result_type = 'Conversion';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 500 AND interaction_type = 'Meeting';
